pageContent.title: Proceed with Caution
pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Proceed with Caution</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">“I have some concerns about the safety risks that may be involved in prescribing Samsca to patients after discharge. If you can walk me through the results of the clinical trials, I’d be open to going forward.”</welcomeText>
